channel.itunes:summary: Samony Podcast gives you fast trend updates in audio form. You get the top stories in tech, sport, politics, lifestyle, culture, and entertainment. Each episode is short and direct. You stay informed without scrolling. You save time. You stay ahead.
channel.itunes:keywords: ai, deepfake, misinformation, public safety, ogun state police, digital forensics, cybersecurity, nigeria, private equity, mauritius, african investment, economic development
channel.description: Samony Podcast gives you fast trend updates in audio form. You get the top stories in tech, sport, politics, lifestyle, culture, and entertainment. Each episode is short and direct. You stay informed without scrolling. You save time. You stay ahead.

item.title: AI-Generated Threats: Unpacking the Ogun State Police Debunk and the Deepfake Challenge
item.description:
This episode delves into the Ogun State Police Command's debunking of viral AI-generated threat videos, assuring public safety. We explore the facts of the incident, the broader controversy surrounding deepfakes and misinformation, and their profound impact on societal trust and security, discussing the challenges for law enforcement and the urgent need for digital literacy.
Hosts: Host: Peter Johnson, Co-Host: Zephyr
Category: Technology and Society
------------------------------------------- Follow Samony Podcast: Twitter: https://twitter.com/samony25 Instagram: https://instagram.com/samony25 Facebook: https://facebook.com/samony25 YouTube: https://youtube.com/@samony25 TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@samony25
Website: https://www.samony.com.ng Contact us: socials@samony.com.ng -------------------------------------------

item.title: The Island Roars: Mauritius Dethrones Nigeria in Private Equity
item.description:
This episode of the Samony Podcast dives deep into the seismic shift in African private equity, where Mauritius has dramatically surpassed Nigeria in deal value in the first nine months of 2025. We explore the 'why' behind Mauritius's meteoric rise, highlighting its stable regulatory environment and strategic financial policies, while dissecting the factors contributing to Nigeria's significant decline, including economic volatility and policy inconsistencies. Join us as we uncover the implications for Africa's investment landscape.
Hosts: Host: Peter Johnson, Co-Host: HypeMan (Naija)
Category: Finance
------------------------------------------- Follow Samony Podcast: Twitter: https://twitter.com/samony25 Instagram: https://instagram.com/samony25 Facebook: https://facebook.com/samony25 YouTube: https://youtube.com/@samony25 TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@samony25
Website: https://www.samony.com.ng Contact us: socials@samony.com.ng -------------------------------------------

item.title: Justice Delayed? Emefiele's Trial Hits Another Roadblock as EFCC Witnesses are Rejected
item.description:
The Samony Podcast delves into the recent FCT High Court decision to reject key EFCC witnesses in the high-profile trial of former CBN Governor, Godwin Emefiele. We explore the procedural reasons behind this significant setback for the prosecution, the implications for the ongoing case, and what it means for justice in Nigeria, with the trial now adjourned to January 2026.
Hosts: Host: Oga Titus (Boss), Co-Host: Sodiq (Street)
Category: Politics
------------------------------------------- Follow Samony Podcast: Twitter: https://twitter.com/samony25 Instagram: https://instagram.com/samony25 Facebook: https://facebook.com/samony25 YouTube: https://youtube.com/@samony25 TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@samony25
Website: https://www.samony.com.ng Contact us: socials@samony.com.ng -------------------------------------------

item.title: Bandits, Schools & Blame Games: Nigeria's Insecurity Crisis
item.description:
Opposition parties in Nigeria are fiercely criticizing the Federal Government for allegedly negotiating with bandits and for the widespread closure of schools due to insecurity. This episode delves into the arguments against these government actions, the devastating impact on education, and the broader implications for national security and public trust.
Hosts: Host, Co-Host
Category: Politics
------------------------------------------- Follow Samony Podcast: Twitter: https://twitter.com/samony25 Instagram: https://instagram.com/samony25 Facebook: https://facebook.com/samony25 YouTube: https://youtube.com/@samony25 TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@samony25
Website: https://www.samony.com.ng Contact us: socials@samony.com.ng -------------------------------------------
